entry.title: Hello world!
entry.content:
Hey people, this is the first post in my attempt of a proper Jekyll blog.

Throughout the, not that frequent, posts of mine, I’ll be writting about interesting technical stuff; These would be C++, Python, Vim, robotics, Linux (yes, that broad :blush: )

Off we go!
entry.summary: Hey people, this is the first post in my attempt of a proper Jekyll blog.
